SAINT.Name: Venerable Paphnutius the Abbot of Borovsk (+1477)
Venerable Martyr Bata the Persian (4th C)
New Venerable Martyrs Euthymius (+1814), Ignatius (+1814), and Acacius (+1816) of Mt. Athos
Icons of the Theotokos: 'Byzantine', 'the Unexpected Joy', 'Myrrh-bearing' (1647), and 'Andronikite' (14th C)
